title: How is Content marketing effective? - Quora

response.answer_text: Giving useful information to prospective or current customers creates trust in your organization from the outset. This encourages them to become participants who collaborate and connect with the organization and who are constantly involved. It does all that conventional ads can do, but at a fraction of the price. Content also helps you, via organic search, to target unique keywords, attracting viewers to your blog or website. Across social networks such as Twitter, Facebook , LinkedIn and Google+, it can be easily shared. This helps you to enter and face the personal networks of readers, and the content does the job of gaining new leads for you. You may also add it into your newsletter subscription whether it is material that you know is important or relevant to your target audience.

There is a lot of ways , you can consider your content marketing is effective , depending upon a lots of metrices. Track Conversion Inbound links Collect Actionable metrics Discuss with the industry peers Downloads Shares Comments Engagements Apart from these , there are lots of metrics for measuring the effectiveness of content marketing.
